COLUMN 1                       COLUMN 2                  COLUMN 3             
ROW 1 COLUMN 1 VERY VERY LONG  ROW 1 COLUMN 2            ROW 1 COLUMN 3       
ROW 2 COLUMN 1                 ROW 2 COLUMN 2 VERY LONG  ROW 2 COLUMN 3       
ROW 3 COLUMN 1                 ROW 3 COLUMN 2            ROW 3 COLUMN 3 LONG
